name: PUTIN, TRUMP and XIN JINPING
description:
PUTIN, TRUMP and XIN JINPING

This game is a 2D shooter. In it, you can shoot and destroy enemies, swim in the submarine, fight for communism in China. You will be confronted by the president of Russia and the United States, but it also includes the bombs and fish they produce.

In the game you will enjoy a pleasant cartoon design, pleasant music, many enemies and the opportunity to play for one of the most influential people on the planet.

Fight, kill enemies and most importantly, survive in this difficult battle.

Features:
  • Your character is the most influential person in China
  • 100 ACHIEVEMENTS with English and Russian ABC
  • Ability to make a world history
  • Opportunity to fight with the most influential people of the planet
